delete.description: Removes an instructor record from the system.

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of users based on optional filters. Supports pagination and sorting.

200.description: Paginated list of users matching the search criteria

get.summary: Get effective roles for a user
get.description: Fetches roles for a user, considering both direct and group assignments, with precedence given to user roles.
Fetches a paginated list of roles based on optional filters. Supports pagination and sorting.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available permissions that can be assigned to roles.

get.description: Search for instructors based on criteria.

User.description: Complete user profile information including personal details, authentication, and organizational data

uuid.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Unique system identifier for the user. Auto-generated by the system and cannot be modified.

first_name.description: **[REQUIRED]** User's given/first name. Used for display purposes and official documentation. Must not be blank.

middle_name.description: **[OPTIONAL]** User's middle name or initial. Can be null or empty if not applicable.

last_name.description: **[REQUIRED]** User's family/last name. Used for display purposes and official documentation. Must not be blank.

email.description: **[REQUIRED]** User's primary email address. Must be unique across the system and follow valid email format. Used for authentication and notifications.

phone_number.description: **[REQUIRED]** User's contact phone number. Should include country code for international numbers. Used for notifications and verification.

dob.description: **[REQUIRED]** User's date of birth in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD). Used for age verification and personalization features.

username.description: **[REQUIRED]** Unique username for system login. Must be unique across the system and cannot be changed after account creation.

organisation_uuid.description: **[OPTIONAL]** UUID of the organization this user belongs to. Links user to their organizational context and determines available resources. Can be null for system administrators.

active.description: **[REQUIRED]** Indicates whether the user account is active and can access the system. Inactive users cannot log in or perform any operations.

roles.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Set of roles assigned to this user. Determines user permissions and access levels within the system. Can be empty for users with no specific roles assigned.

example.name: ADMIN
example.description: Administrator role with full system access

example.name: USER
example.description: Standard user role with basic access

gender.description: **[OPTIONAL]** User's gender information. Used for demographic analytics and personalization. Can be null if not specified or preferred not to disclose.

user_domain.description: **[OPTIONAL]** List of domain roles that define the user's functional areas within the system. Determines available features and workflows. Can contain multiple values.

profile_image_url.description: **[READ-ONLY]** URL to the user's profile image/avatar. Automatically generated after image upload and cannot be directly modified.

created_date.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Timestamp when the user account was first created. Automatically set by the system and cannot be modified.

modified_date.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Timestamp when the user account was last modified. Automatically updated by the system on any changes and cannot be directly modified.

Student.description: Student profile information including guardian contacts and academic details. Links to a base user account.

uuid.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Unique system identifier for the student profile. Auto-generated by the system.

user_uuid.description: **[REQUIRED]** Reference to the base user account UUID. Links student profile to user authentication and personal details.

first_guardian_name.description: **[REQUIRED]** Full name of the primary guardian/parent. This is the main emergency contact for the student.

first_guardian_mobile.description: **[REQUIRED]** Mobile phone number of the primary guardian. Used for emergency contacts and notifications. Should include country code.

second_guardian_name.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Full name of the secondary guardian/parent. Additional emergency contact for the student.

second_guardian_mobile.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Mobile phone number of the secondary guardian. Alternative contact for emergencies and notifications. Should include country code.

created_date.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Timestamp when the student profile was first created. Automatically set by the system.

created_by.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Email or username of the user who created this student profile. Used for audit trails.

updated_date.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Timestamp when the student profile was last modified. Automatically updated by the system on any changes.

updated_by.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Email or username of the user who last modified this student profile. Used for audit trails.

Instructor.description: Comprehensive instructor profile including professional qualifications, training experience, certifications, and location data for educational service delivery

example.bio: Experienced educator with 10+ years in software development training and mentorship.
example.professional_headline: Senior Software Development Instructor & Tech Consultant

uuid.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Unique system identifier for the instructor profile. Auto-generated by the system.

user_uuid.description: **[REQUIRED]** Reference to the base user account UUID. Links instructor profile to user authentication and personal details.

latitude.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Geographical latitude coordinate of instructor's primary training location. Used for location-based instructor matching and distance calculations.

longitude.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Geographical longitude coordinate of instructor's primary training location. Used for location-based instructor matching and distance calculations.

website.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Professional website or portfolio URL. Used to showcase instructor's work, testimonials, and additional credentials.

bio.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Professional biography describing instructor's background, expertise, teaching philosophy, and experience. Used in instructor profiles and course descriptions.
bio.example: Experienced educator with 10+ years in software development training and mentorship. Specializes in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and agile methodologies.

professional_headline.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Professional headline or title that summarizes instructor's expertise and role. Used in search results and instructor listings.
professional_headline.example: Senior Software Development Instructor & Tech Consultant

professional_bodies.description: **[OPTIONAL]** List of professional bodies and associations the instructor is affiliated with. Used to verify professional standing and credibility.

example.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE)

training_experiences.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Detailed training and teaching experience history. Documents instructor's practical experience in delivering educational content.

certifications.description: **[OPTIONAL]** Professional certifications and qualifications held by the instructor. Used to verify expertise and authorize teaching specific subjects.

full_name.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Complete name of the instructor including titles and credentials. Automatically derived from user profile and professional credentials.

created_date.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Timestamp when the instructor profile was first created. Automatically set by the system.

created_by.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Email or username of the user who created this instructor profile. Used for audit trails and administrative purposes.

updated_date.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Timestamp when the instructor profile was last modified. Automatically updated by the system on any changes.

updated_by.description: **[READ-ONLY]** Email or username of the user who last modified this instructor profile. Used for audit trails and administrative purposes.

membership_no.description: Membership number assigned by the body

member_since.description: Date when the user became a member (ISO 8601 format)

user_uuid.description: UUID of the user associated with this membership

organisation_name.description: Name of the organisation where the experience was gained

job_title.description: Job title held during the training or experience

work_description.description: Description of responsibilities and tasks performed
work_description.example: Managed regional health analytics dashboard and provided training to local analysts.

start_date.description: Start date of the training/experience (ISO 8601 format)

end_date.description: End date of the training/experience (ISO 8601 format)

user_uuid.description: UUID of the user associated with this training/experience

issued_date.description: Date the certificate was issued (ISO 8601 format)

certificate_url.description: URL pointing to the certificate resource

user_uuid.description: UUID of the user who owns this certificate
